channel.title: business and finance on Argolon Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in business and finance on Argolon Solutions

item.title: Piece in Business & Finance Magazine
item.description: Adam Maguire kindly invited several of us to give our top IT money-saving tips for 2009 in a recent issue of Business & Finance. That piece is now up on his blog. I naturally focused on Cloud Computing and SaaS. Thanks Adam.
